metadata.title: CVE-2023-0459 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Copy_from_user on 64-bit versions of the Linux kernel does not implementthe __uaccess_begin_nospec allowing a user to bypass the "access_ok" checkand pass a kernel pointer to copy_from_user(). This would allow an attackerto leak information. We recommend upgrading beyond commit74e19ef0ff8061ef55957c3abd71614ef0f42f47

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
